articles.title: London Calling: Holiday plans in the United Kingdom
articles.description: The British government is working on a plan to allow family gatherings this holiday season despite the nation's coronavirus lockdown measures. CBS News contributor Simon Bates explains how the season could look different in this edition of "London Calling."

articles.title: South Dakota marks one of its highest daily death tolls since the coronavirus pandemic began
articles.description: South Dakota ranks second behind North Dakota for the country's highest number of virus cases per capita in the last two weeks, according to The COVID Tracking Project. David Begnaud visited Sioux Falls to ask South Dakotans about the city's new mask mandate.

articles.author: Lois Parshley
articles.title: COVID-19 has been smoldering in rural America for months. Here’s why we missed it.
articles.description: A dangerous combination of limited resources, stigma, and politics made the coronavirus difficult to track in rural areas, allowing its spread to go largely unnoticed all summer.
